predicate.note: Frames file for 'contaminate' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet entry fill-9.8, other framed members include spot, surround, trim, soak.

roleset.name: befoul

example.name: transitive
example.text: At stake was an $80,000 settlement involving who should pay what share of cleanup costs at the site of a former gas station, where underground fuel tanks had leaked and contaminated the soil.

example.name: with contaminant
example.text: John contaminates any room he enters with his foul stench.

roleset.note: Do try to distinguish between agent/source of contamination and the contaminant itself; this will result in some Arg2's being subjects.
